h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: The next Mind Core is located in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside The Forest area. Along the left side of the area, you can find a small path beneath a leaning branch. At the back of this path is a waterfall that you can enter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 3'.
The content is as follows:
The next Mind Core is located in the Forest of Wolves \- Outside The Forest area. Along the left side of the area, you can find a small path beneath a leaning branch. At the back of this path is a waterfall that you can enter.
